title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct research and gather input from stakeholders to understand the desired features and functionalities of the SocialFabricVisualizer system.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall architecture of the SocialFabricVisualizer system, including the components, data flow, integration with external systems or data sources, and considerations for scalability, maintainability, and performance.

title: Data Modeling and Database Design
description: Design the data models and database schemas required to store and manage social connection data, user profiles, social interactions, activity logs, and other relevant information for the SocialFabricVisualizer application.

title: User Interface and Experience Design
description: Design the user interface and user experience for the SocialFabricVisualizer application, including the augmented reality visualization components and user interactions.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend components of the SocialFabricVisualizer system, including data processing, social network analysis algorithms, and integration with external data sources.

title: Frontend Development
description: Implement the frontend components of the SocialFabricVisualizer application, including the augmented reality visualization, user interface, and interactions.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Evaluate and implement security measures to protect user data and ensure privacy, including data encryption, access controls, and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for the SocialFabricVisualizer system, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure and processes for the SocialFabricVisualizer system, including continuous integration, continuous deployment, and monitoring.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the SocialFabricVisualizer system, including user guides, technical documentation, and support resources.
